title: Paracetamol Mechanism of Action
abstract: Paracetamol acts centrally by inhibiting cyclooxygenase enzymes in the brain reducing prostaglandin synthesis and lowering fever.WHO Drug Monograph

title: Safety and Dosage of Paracetamol
abstract: Therapeutic doses of paracetamol are generally safe; overdose causes hepatotoxicity due to NAPQI accumulation.BMJ Review 2024paracetamol dosage safety

title: Paracetamol vs Ibuprofen in Pediatric Fever
abstract: A comparative study showing paracetamol is equally effective for fever reduction with fewer gastro intestinal side effects.Lancet 2023paracetamol ibuprofen children
